lighting_setup.weather: Clear sky with soft directional sunlight
lighting_setup.quality: Soft directional sunlight creating distinct contrast between illuminated facade and shadowed street
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Minimal interior warm ambient light (faintly visible in windows)

color_grading.palette: Warm Analogous; Terracotta, and beige tones against a high-key pale blue sky
color_grading.contrast: Medium-High (emphasizing the difference between sunlit facades and shadowed vegetation)

texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Smooth reflective glass windows, asphalt road texture

technical_quality.post_processing: Vertical perspective correction (Shift), Shadow recovery in foliage
technical_quality.white_balance: Daylight (5200K) allowing warm sunset light to render naturally
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High (balancing bright sunlit facade with shadowed street level)
